original_text: When Athaliah heard the noise of the guard and of the people, she went into the house of the Lord to the people.
korean_text: 아달랴가 호위병과 백성의 소리를 듣고 여호와의 성전에 들어가 백성에게 이르러

sentences.original_text: When Athaliah heard the noise of the guard and of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 아달랴가 호위병과 백성의 소리를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: she went into the house of the Lord to the people.
